mapper.select: SELECT qscon.skill_id, qsclass.name FROM question_info qi LEFT JOIN question_skill_con qscon ON qscon.question_id = qi.question_id LEFT JOIN question_skill_class qsclass ON qsclass.class_id = (SELECT qs.class from question_skill qs WHERE qs.skill_id = qscon.skill_id) WHERE qi.question_id = #{id}
SELECT qa.content, qa.url, qa.type FROM question_info qi LEFT JOIN question_answer qa ON qa.answer_id = qi.answer_id WHERE qi.question_id = #{id}

SELECT qrcon.res_id, ri.title, ri.type from question_info qi LEFT JOIN question_res_con qrcon on qrcon.question_id = qi.question_id LEFT JOIN res_info ri on ri.res_id = qrcon.res_id WHERE qi.question_id = #{id}

SELECT qs.solve_id, qs.thumb_up, qs.thumb_down FROM question_info qi LEFT JOIN question_solve qs ON qs.solve_id in (select solve_id from question_solve_con qscon where qscon.question_id = qi.question_id) WHERE qi.question_id = #{id}
select state from question_info where question_id = #{id}

SELECT qs.state FROM question_info qi LEFT JOIN question_solve qs ON qs.solve_id in (select solve_id from question_solve_con qscon where qscon.question_id = qi.question_id) WHERE qi.question_id = #{id}

select question_id questionId, content, url, up_id upId, from_id fromId, difficulty, type, count, solve_id solveId, answer_id answerId, edit_date editDate, state from question_info where question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.insert: insert into question_answer (answer_id, content, url, type, up_id, edit_date) values(#{answerId},#{content},#{url},#{type},#{upId},#{editDate})
mapper.update: update question_answer set content = #{content},url=#{url},type=#{type} where answer_id = #{answerId}
UPDATE question_info set answer_id = #{answerId} where question_id = #{questionId}
